segments.client_message: Um, I guess I’m not too sure. Like, I don’t want to lose my money, but I also, I know I need to grow it some, right? So, it’s kinda... tricky.

segments.advisor_message: I understand, it can be a little overwhelming. How would you react if your investment dropped, say, 20%? Would you sell immediately or hold on?
